item.title: Getting started with labview
item.description: Installation or Setup # Detailed instructions on getting LabVIEW set up or installed.

item.title: How to create a VI Snippet in LabVIEW and post in a question.
item.description: Parameters # Parameter Details Number 1 Numeric Control Number 2 Numeric Control Sum Numeric Indicator Create VI snippet from Block Diagram # VI snippets are like Screenshots of a Block Diagram, with one important difference. They can be opened in LabVIEW to reconstruct the orginal program. They are saved in the common .PNG format so they can be used like normal pictures e.g. in forums and on StackOverflow. To create a VI snippet mark the important part of your Block Diagram and hit “Edit â†’ Create VI Snippet from Selection”.
